mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO(ID, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, JOB, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, HANDICAP) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{job}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{handicap})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL FROM USER_INFO WHERE NAME=#{name} AND EMAIL=#{email} AND BIRTH=#{birth}
SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL FROM USER_INFO WHERE ID=#{id} AND NAME=#{name} AND EMAIL=#{email } AND BIRTH=#{birth}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PWD=#{pwd} WHERE ID=#{id}
